pos review: Sofa bed very comfy like a normal bed, (we fell asleep infront of tv instead of going up to bed) information pack left for us very usefull
neg review: Door a little hard to shut without key

pos review: As we were exploring the WW1 battlefields this was the perfect place to stay. The Menin Gate was only a couple of minutes walk away and the rebuilt Cloth Hall and Cathedral are also very close.
neg review: This apartment is on 3 floors and the stairs are narrow and steep. Also the bedroom is at the top whilst the bathroom is on the ground floor.

pos review: cozy house perfectly located for a visit of the town
The accommodation was very much in keeping with the character of Ypres and positioned within walking distance of the market square and Menin Gate.
neg review: The stairs to the bedrooms were steep and narrow meaning we had to leave our suitcases downstairs, but this was not a big issue for a short stay.

pos review: Great location would definitely return, very helpful host
Great location, great hosts, good kitchen and supplied electronic items
neg review: Stairs very steep so would not recommend for elderly guests and young children,  apart form that  I would highly recommend this property

pos review: great location, great appartement. Comfortable beds, everything great, also the welcome basket incl the beer.
